PluginData.Author: BDCarrillo
PluginData.Description:
Overview When seated in a cockpit, this mod draws lines to depict the prograde, retrograde, and gravity vector for your current grid. Note these lines are a fixed length, and only indicate direction.
B(lue)ow, R(ed)everse, G(reen)ravity
Runs client-side only.
You can cycle the line overlays by typing "/vector" in chat
Credits -DirectedEnergy for the idea -Jerrai for the clever mnemonic
